biotools.summary: CIRCexplorer3 is a CLEAR Pipeline for Direct Comparison of Circular and Linear RNA Expression. It is a computational pipeline for Circular and Linear RNA Expression Analysis from Ribosomal-RNA depleted (Ribo–) RNA-seq.
